Attacks.Name: Flamethrower
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character gains the Burn special condition.

Attacks.Name: Flame Wheel
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character gains the Burn special condition and is pushed away S distance.

Attacks.Name: Eruption
Attacks.Effect: This attack deals damage to all characters (friend and foe) within range 2 of the target character. The damage dealt is reduced by 1 for each damage on Typhlosion.

Attacks.Name: Blast Burn
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character gains the Burn special condition and all enemy characters within range 1 of the target suffer 2 damage.

Superpowers.Name: Blaze
Superpowers.Effect: When this character has 3 or fewer Stamina remaining, increase the Strength of all its Fire-type attacks by 3.

Superpowers.Name: Flame Cloak
Superpowers.Effect: This character gains immunity to the Burn special condition. Additionally, enemy characters that make melee attacks against this character gain the Burn special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Flash Fire
Superpowers.Effect: When this character is targeted by a Fire-type attack, it gains 2 power instead of taking damage.

Attacks.Name: Inferno
Attacks.Effect: This attack deals damage to all characters (friend and foe) within range 2 of the target character. All affected characters gain the Burn special condition. If a wild is rolled, the damage is increased by 2.

Superpowers.Name: Eruption
Superpowers.Effect: All enemy characters within range and line of sight suffer 3 damage and gain the Burn special condition. This superpower can be used only once per game.
